mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dress(mb_uid, spring, summer, autumn, winter, color, dress_img_org, dress_img_sav, dress_name, dress_memo, share_type) VALUES (#{dto.mb_uid}, #{dto.spring}, #{dto.summer}, #{dto.autumn}, #{dto.winter}, #{dto.color}, #{dto.dress_img_org}, #{dto.dress_img_sav}, #{dto.dress_name}, #{dto.dress_memo}, #{dto.share_type});
